xuiTab
directive in module xui

Description

Used to list tabs under the xui-tabs directive.

Dependencies

  • xuiTabs

Usage

as element:
<xui-tab
       tab-id="{string}"
       tab-title="{string}"
       title="{string}">
</xui-tab>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
tabIdstring

Identifier for tab. Used for selection. If title is blank, it is also used for display.

tabTitlestring

Displayed title of the tab. Can change.

titlestring

[DEPRECATED] Displayed title of the tab. Can cause side effect: Tab title overlaying the whole tab content. UIF-2112

Example
